website_summaries.verdict: Adorable, easy for little kids to carry, and perfect for lighthearted superhero play, a Wonder Woman toddler doll is a sweet gift for young DC Comics fans.
pros: Cute premium toddler doll featuring Wonder Woman’s costume, tiara, and Lasso of Truth
Easily stands or sits in place
cons: This doll’s costume wasn’t designed to be swapped out easily

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll with Lots of Accessories
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves Wonder Woman and was thrilled to get this doll. It came with all the accessories a Wonder Woman lover would need and is just the perfect size for my preK fan. My only compliant was a construction issue: one of the legs is a little loose, so it swings freely much of the time (whereas the other leg you have to manipulate yourself). Otherwise a great gift for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Boys-Mom

customer_reviews.title: She was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler developed a Wonder Woman obsession but she is anti barbie so a baby wonderments woman was great!! She had the whole outfit and was well packed, maybe too well we had some difficulty getting her out because of the anti theft plastic tag ties.
customer_reviews.author: Mama mouse

customer_reviews.title: Item different than pictured, no cape or lasso
customer_reviews.text: Received a different item than what was ordered. Description said it was an 8 piece Wonder Woman doll, and the one I received only has 6 (no cape or belt with lasso). My daughter wanted the one with the cape. Now I need to return and try to find somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: Best toddler doll I’ve purchased. My niece loved it. She immediately opened it and started to play. Great quality beautifully made. Colorful and sweet and perfect little doll.
customer_reviews.author: D. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great super hero fan doll for your little wonder woman
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with her wanted a Wonder woman & she's the perfect doll! The Price was good compared to other dolls & store's for same doll.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy shopping

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable, girls love them!
customer_reviews.text: Daughters have been obsessed with batgirl and wonder woman and supergirl girl and these are amazing. Durable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie R Warren

customer_reviews.title: Most adorable doll ever
customer_reviews.text: This doll was adored by my 3 yr old. She got it for a birthday present and takes it everywhere she goes. The anime look of the eyes and the bright colored clothing or perfect for being a stand out toy or even a decoration for a Wonder Woman themed party.
customer_reviews.author: Katelicom

customer_reviews.title: DC Superhero Girls Toddler Doll Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: It’s so adorable!! Perfect for our niece for her birthday so we bought all 4 dolls and a blanket. I was surprised how heavy the box is with the doll. We ordered this for next day and delivered on time. The box has normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grand daughter’s 6th birthday. She loves all things Wonder Woman, and this W W doll is a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: LeonaBelle

customer_reviews.title: ... came completely crashed the night before Christmas it was pretty bad since it is clear hard plastic it made ...
customer_reviews.text: Box came completely crashed the night before Christmas it was pretty bad since it is clear hard plastic it made it dangerous for my daughter to handle it or even touch it. Disappointed about that. The dolly is pretty should had got it somewhere else I guess
customer_reviews.author: acirebellita

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman toddler doll
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a cute doll. I love her. Best collector doll. :)

product_meta.title: DC Toddler Dolls - 15" Wonder Woman Toddler Doll, Includes: 8 Pieces
product_meta.description: DC Super Hero Girls 15-inch wonder Woman toddler girl is ready for lots of fun action! this toddler girl has her signature iconic outfit and gorgeous rooted hair. Recommended for ages 3+.
feature_bullets: Wonder Woman toddler girl is ready for lots of fun action
